title: [Get Started with CCTP Bridge](https://www.tally.xyz/get-started)
content: Apply for MultiGov access by submitting your request to Tally.

title: [Use Automatic Transfers with CCTP Bridge](/docs/products/multigov/get-started/)
content: Simplify your USDC transfer process with automated attestation fetching and transfer completion

title: [Use Manual Transfers with CCTP Bridge](/docs/products/multigov/get-started/)
content: Use manual transfer for maximum control, such as inserting custom logic for gas management or manual transaction signing.
